short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix the corrupted RTL texts on your webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use a Right To Left language, then you have seen what would happen if a website does not handle RTL text very well. Using this browser extension could help you out to fix these type of texts.
NOTE: Currently this version of the extension (v0.1.0) is just a quick hack to fix some text in you day-to-day browsing and it's under active development. In near future I would support more features. If you see any issues and bugs please report them here on the comment section or shoot me an issue on Github: https://github.com/MahdiAghaei1/rtlit/issues
